strings.title: Generate token for Montandon
strings.description: By clicking 'Accept & Generate' button, you'll  accept the {termsLink} of the Montandon API. Please make sure to review it.
strings.titleInputPlaceholder: Enter a descriptive title for the token
strings.titleInputHint: Note: title should contain at least {minCharacters} characters
strings.tokenNote: Please make sure to copy and store the token safely. Once you close this modal, you'll not be able to see the token again!
